name: Hypem - Smooth Red
description: A light theme featuring red accents with a clean, tidy experience that removes clutter.

user.name: Hackur
user.about: If you have a problem that I haven't listed, or you find something outdated, let me know and I'll try to update it!

additional_info:
Please start a discussion under the feedback section if you come across something wrong with the theme.

Version 1.2 - 15/4/16
- Option to show or hide the blog thumbnails header under the latest music blogged section
- Option to show or hide Tour Dates
- Option to show or hide News
- Option to show or hide track/blog/post info (includes "posted by X blogs" button)
- Option to show or hide track buy links
- Style blog header, tour dates and news, blog post info and buy links

Version 1.1 - 13/4/16
- Tiny color tweaks
- Song from previous page notification themed red
- Player progress bar themed red
- Active track minor background

Version 1.0 - 12/4/16
- Initial Version

style_setting_options.label: Hide (Default)
